title: League of Legends isn't working on my mac at all + download page broken
body:
I've had the mac client on my computer for years. i came across an error and i just decided to delete the application then redownload it again, except the official client download link isn't working. the page is blank. also i can't click support on the top right because that creates a blank page too. I had my friend send me the file 'League of Legends OC1' over skype, but i tried installing it and the launcher won't open. 
i also tried and deleted rads > solutions and i moved the app to the league folder but it still doesn't work.

i also get this error message when i try to drag the league folder into my application folder; "The directory you have chosen is invalid. Please verify you have write permissions or select another directory".
it would really mean a lot to me if you guys solved this problem. I love league {{champion:32}} .

replies.body:
Sounds like your hosts are being Hijacked.

Could you check your hosts file please.

Open a terminal and type sudo vim /etc/hosts and post whats in there.

Ill let you know if its broken.

-SumCoolAid
I am having the same problem.. i am downloading it but when i open the download it says that i need to verify etc... if you found a solution please help... :(

TheProH0bo - what do you see when you click this link: https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload

Can you please add a screenshot?
It shows the regular screen that asks you to click the mac download. When I click the download link this is what I get.

Alternatively, stop trying to play league on a coffee table ornament & get a real computer :P

jkjk

You might need to uninstall, manually clear the folder and then reinstall into your applications folder. Macs can be very finicky about you trying to move program files & folders around.
